page.title: 17Where we live.
page.content: Much of the properties lie within the {Green Belt}and that population levels are controlled. Scattered around the countryside are a number of thatched cottages.Within the more urban areas,house development is mainly late 19th and early 20th century. Within the parish of Birchanger there are a number of council houses along- side a new housing estate. The village of Stansted is made up of council and private dwellings forming estates to the east of the village. Leading down towards the centre of the village on the south side you find many Victorian properties. The centre of the village is much older and some distinctive houses date from{Tudor}times.They stand very proud with their oak beams and attract many {tourists}during summer months.
